text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity. Every challenge is a chance to grow stronger and wiser.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
author: Melody Beattie

text: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

text: It's okay to not be okay. Healing is not linear, and every step forward, no matter how small, is progress.
author: Unknown

text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
author: Mark Twain

text: Every morning we are born again. What we do today matters most.
author: Buddha

text: When you are grateful, fear disappears and abundance appears.
author: Tony Robbins

text: Tears are words the heart can't express.
author: Unknown

text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the assessment that something else is more important than fear. The brave may not live forever, but the cautious do not live at all.
author: Meg Cabot

text: Your value doesn't decrease based on someone's inability to see your worth. Stand tall, stay true to yourself, and never dim your light for anyone.
author: Unknown
